Name: Postman skip
Description: Long Jump Attack to skip the postman trigger.

Name: Spirit Postman
Description: Trigger the postman in in Twilight State.

Name: Ilia's Bag Sliding
Description: Pick up Ilia's bag as human Link, pushing Link at fast speeds. This is a possibility due to Early Master Sword.

Name: Ice Cave Save Warp to Eldin
Description: ? Incorrect save location? What happens if the bridge is gone?

Name: Epona Clip
Description: Clip through the terrain near a ramp with a precise setup

Name: Epona Clip (Slow)
Description: Clip through the terrain near a ramp with a precise setup, but without much speed

Name: Wagon End Trigger Skip
Description: Last trick in video. Perform LJAs to skip to the win condition for the wagon event.

Name: Eldin Bridge Clip via Owl Statue
Description: Use the owl statue to clip Link into the Eldin Bridge

Name: Boar Past Barrier
Description: Push a boar through the invisible barrier and ride it outside of its intended area.

Name: Rupee Bridge Clip
Description: Clip up from underneath the bridge via use of Double Claw shots

Name: Camera Zoom Glitch
Description: Use map glitch to jump off a cliff for several minutes, then water bomb upwarp to glitch out the camera.

Name: Music manip glitches
Description: Hitting triggers to alter which midi tracks play (?)

Name: Epona Rock Clip (Softlocks)
Description: Clip through rocks using epona to push you inbounds.

Name: Piece of Heart Superjump
Description: Lure enemy to the right spot to superjump into the piece of heart in the tree (Is this video a randomizer?)

Name: Midna Dialogue Text Displacement
Description: Talk to Midna once after crawling through the tunnel from afar. This causes dialogue that normally plays during the cutscene to instead play immediately, saving a very small amount of time.

Name: Midna Fall Dialog Skip
Description: Jump off the edge of the spiral staircase at a good angle to avoid Midna text.

Name: Glitchy Crawlspace (Carrying skull as Wolf)
Description: Pick up a skull as wolf link, and make sharp 90 degree turns into the tunnel. The skull should get trapped inside, causing Wolf Link to oscillate.

Name: Glitchy Crawlspace (Iron boots underwater)
Description: Repeatedly fail to enter the tunnel when attempting to use iron boots to backtrack in Sewers 2.

Name: Midna Rooftops Dialogue Trigger Escape
Description: Upon entering the Castle Rooftops, there is a 1 frame window to skip the Midna text via a jump attack immediately after the cutscene is skipped.

Name: Wind Cycle Reset
Description: Call Midna to reset the wind cycle on the bridge, which is faster than waiting if you miss the wind cycle.

Name: Castle Town Wrong Warp
Description: Use actor corruption to save warp from Zelda's Tower to Castle Town. The save location gets written during the Castle Town cutscene, but does not update again when it is supposed to during the final Zelda cutscene.

Name: Squidna Cutscene Skip
Description: Using actor corruption, waste enough memory that the large cutscene arc files cannot load. This skips the cutscene entirely.

Name: Louise Camera-Lock
Description: Start the Louise cutscene during MDH in a special way to shorten the cutscene by a couple seconds.

Name: Telma Dialog Skip (Grants Text Displacement)
Description: Talk to Louise in such a way that she pushes you into a cutscene trigger, disabling the trigger. Speaking to her afterwards will cycle through the dialogue boxes one by one, granting various Text Displacement bits.

Name: Telma's Bar Broken Pot Cancel
Description: Cancel the Goron noticing Link by speaking to Midna just as a pot breaks.

Name: Jovani's House as Human Link
Description: Transform into human Link in a precise spot, allowing Link to talk to Jovani as human, and perform a glitchy exit via the door.

Name: Cant Turn in 20 Poe Souls (WMG)
Description: With White Midna glitch active, the 20 Poe souls cannot be turned in, plus some other dialog oddities. TODO: Confirm

Name: Star Minigame #2 Without Double Clawshot
Description: Technically not a glitch. Complete the mini-game with a regular clawshot. Possible on SD, but harder. Easier with Iron Boots, but not required.

Name: [TAS] Rope Skip
Description: TAS version of the rope skip trick that uses a pot collision to push the player in a favorable direction.

Name: South Castle Town Rupee Chest Superjump
Description: Lure flying enemy to just the right spot to superjump towards it, landing by the 50 rupee chest.

Name: Stair Ledge Clip
Description: Somehow star a ledge grab on stairs. Provides no real value.

Name: Double-Clawshot and Spinner Skip
Description: Get through Hyrule Castle without the Double-Clawshot or Spinner items. Important if we ever find a way to skip these items.

Name: Link Stuck Walking during Beast Gannon
Description: Link stuck in a walking animation after getting hit by Beast Gannon

Name: [HD?] King Bulbin Key on Ground
Description: For some reason in the key was on the ground prior to the fight starting, and King Bulbin hands over an empty key.

Name: Long Jump Attack Minor Time Save
Description: Technically not a glitch. Minor time save to long jump attack as the magic fences disappear to leave quickly.

Name: Torch Puzzle Out of Order
Description: If moving fast enough, it is possible to complete the 4 torch lighting puzzle in the wrong order. Need more details.

Name: Mystery Warp
Description: Climbing the ledge in a particular spot here causes Link to yeet across the map

Name: Rat Jump (Remi Skip)
Description: Wolf Link jump attack into a dying rat to gain height and access the ramp without boomerang

Name: Beast Gannon Softlock + OOB Clip
Description: Let go of Midna A grab, and it is possible to get Beast Gannon stuck in the wall, and use him to clip OOB.

Name: Boar Step Clip
Description: Skip boars using a step-up clip to clip through the wall
